revision.text: __NOTOC__ {{ZScriptNote}} '''{{class|Actor}}''' clearscope Inventory '''FindInventory''' (class ''itemtype'', bool ''subclass'' = false) const ==Usage== Looks for the specified item class in the calling actor's [[inventory]]. ===Parameters=== *{{c|class '''itemtype'''}} :The {{class|Inventory|inventory item}} to look for. *{{c|bool '''subclass'''}} :If true, the function also looks for items which are derived from ''itemtype'', otherwise it only looks for that specific item. Default is false ===Return value=== If an item is found, the function returns a pointer to that item, otherwise it returns ''null''. ==Examples== {{noexamples}} [[Category:ZScript]]
